body:
if you are using RNNCell / LSTMCell, then you can register a hook on the weights to access individual weights.
If you are using nn.RNN / nn.LSTM, then there is no way on the GPU because CuDNN does the whole operation in a single CUDA kernel, i.e. there is no individual ops.
